name: Threes Free
description:
Do you feel comfortable with numbers or is math your worst nightmare? In either case "Threes Free" is your chance to rule over Math!

After the worldwide success of math game "2048", here's the new challenge for you: Threes Free!

HOW TO PLAY:
Twin tiles (same value and color) sum together (3 + 3, 6 + 6, and so on), except for "1s" and "2s" that get together to generate "threes".

Play as long as you want: this is a endless game, you only need to always find the highest tile's value that you can! The highest the value, the highest the score at the end of the match!

If you have any suggestion to improve Threes feel free to send us an email at: info@whatwapp.com.

FOLLOW US:

Game inspired by Sirvo llc's game, available at: http://asherv.com/threes/
